thread.title: Literature’s most popular romantics summed up in a single text : theCHIVE
thread.title_full: Literature’s most popular romantics summed up in a single text : theCHIVE

title: Literature’s most popular romantics summed up in a single text : theCHIVE
text:
View as Slideshow 1 
Love is hard. That’s as true today as it was at the beginning of mankind. But imagine for a moment how different classic romantic stories would’ve sounded at present if the love interests summed up their entire relationship in a single text exchange. Well, thanks to the people over at Sparknotes , now you don’t have to envision the quick conversations, you can see exactly how they would’ve played out. Enjoy! 
“The Great Gatsby” By F. Scott Fitzgerald (Above) 2 
“Les Misérables” By Victor Hugo 3
